sfxVariationId.Wiki: Specify SFX variation (used to identify SFX in combination with TimeActEditor ID)

behaviorId.Wiki: Set the effect that occurs when using a tool

appearanceReplaceItemId.Wiki: Conditionally replace the display with another tool ID. The tool ID on the game data side does not change

yesNoDialogMessageId.Wiki: YesNo Message ID used when displaying the dialog

useEnableSpEffectType.Wiki: Allow to use only when the special effect of the set state change type is applied

potGroupId.Wiki: Consumable items for which 0 or more is set for the pot group ID can be possessed by the number of pots with the same pot group ID.

shopLv.Wiki: Level that can be sold at the store

spEffectCategory.Wiki: Since there are effects (enchantment weapons, etc.) whose parameters fluctuate depending on skills, magic, items, etc., set each action so that the determined effect can correspond to the effect such as power up only weapon attack. Set None for items that do not need to be set, such as varistor.

goodsUseAnim.Wiki: Set the animation to play when using the tool

opmeMenuType.Wiki: Menu type that opens when using an item

useLimitCategory.Wiki: Specified to control whether it can be used by the special effect applied

replaceCategory.Wiki: Condition category to add to call ID

enable_live.Wiki: Is it possible to use a surviving player?

enable_black.Wiki: Is it possible to do a black ghost?

enable_multi.Wiki: Can it be used during multiplayer?

isConsume.Wiki: Will it be consumed when used (whether the number of possessions will decrease)

isAutoEquip.Wiki: Will it be equipped automatically when picked up?

isOnlyOne.Wiki: Is it an item that you can only have one?

isDiscard.Wiki: Can you throw away the item? TRUE = thrown away

isDeposit.Wiki: Can you leave it in the warehouse?

isDisableHand.AltName: Disable if Right Hand is Empty
isDisableHand.Wiki: Can't be used when the right-handed weapon is bare-handed?

isRemoveItem_forGameClear.Wiki: Whether to delete at the time of lap

isEnhance.Wiki: Do you want to enchant your weapon?

isFixItem.Wiki: Is it an item to repair?

disableUseAtColiseum.Wiki: Is it prohibited to use in the arena?

disableUseAtOutOfColiseum.AltName: Disable Usage outside of Multiplayer Arena
disableUseAtOutOfColiseum.Wiki: Is it prohibited to use outside the arena?

isEnableFastUseItem.Wiki: Is it possible to cancel early?

isApplySpecialEffect.Wiki: Whether to reflect special effects (such as ability value correction)

syncNumVaryId.Wiki: When the number of items is changed, the items with the same ID will be changed at the same time. 0 Not synchronized

refVirtualWepId.Wiki: Weapon ID to refer to when using the tool

vagrantItemLotId.Wiki: -1 No vagrant 0 No lottery 1 With lottery

vagrantBonusEneDropItemLotId.Wiki: -1 No drop 0 No lottery 1 With lottery

vagrantItemEneDropItemLotId.Wiki: -1 No drop 0 No lottery 1 With lottery

castSfxId.Wiki: SFXID until the effect is activated when you try to use the item

fireSfxId.Wiki: SFX ID when the item is activated

effectSfxId.Wiki: After the item is activated, the SFX ID in effect

enable_ActiveBigRune.Wiki: Can it be used with a large rune activated?

isBonfireWarpItem.Wiki: If the state change type Warp Prohibition is applied when TRUE, remove the function to disable the item.

enable_Ladder.Wiki: Check here for items available in the ladder

isUseMultiPlayPreparation.Wiki: Whether items can be used between session probability and initial synchronization

isWarpProhibited.Wiki: When this is TRUE, disable the item if the state change type Warp Prohibition is applied.

isUseMultiPenaltyOnly.AltName: Usable if Disconnect Penalty is Active
isUseMultiPenaltyOnly.Wiki: A flag that allows you to determine if an item is only available when a client disconnect penalty is incurred.

suppleType.Wiki: Replenishment item / Replenishment type when replenishing a replenished item.

autoReplenishType.Wiki: Controls whether or not to automatically replenish and default settings

isDrop.Wiki: Can I put the item on the spot? TRUE = can be placed

showLogCondType.Wiki: Whether to display in the item acquisition log when acquiring the item (not entered )

isSummonHorse.Wiki: Is it an item that summons a horse? Cannot be used if the horse died or the PC is in a horse-prohibited area

showDialogCondType.Wiki: Whether to display it in the item acquisition dialog when acquiring an item (not entered new only)

isSleepCollectionItem.Wiki: Is it a Nemuri collection item?

enableRiding.Wiki: Can it be used while riding?

disableRiding.Wiki: Is it prohibited to use while not riding?

sortGroupId.Wiki: Sort item type ID. In the sort Item type order, the same ID is displayed together as the same group.

isUseNoAttackRegion.Wiki: Can it be used in an attack-prohibited area?
